name: find_zip_codes_by_city
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool polish_zip_codes.
Tool description: Poczta polska - zip codes
API description: This function returns all zip codes associated with a given city. If multiple cities share the same name, zip codes for all those cities will be returned.

city.description: The name of the city for which to find zip codes.

x_traceid.description: A trace ID that is copied to the API response header. Default is 'optional_abc123'.
